Sysdig是开源的，系统级的探索：捕获来自正在运行的Linux实例的系统状态和活动，然后保存，过滤和分析

Sysdig在Lua中是可编写脚本的，并且包括一个命令行界面和一个强大的交互式UI，csysdig，它在终端中运行。想想sysdig作为strace + tcpdump + htop + iftop + lsof + transaction tracing + awesome sauce。

Sysdig的互交式UI的快速浏览

Sysdig的互交式UI的快速浏览

将系统活动转储到文件，以便sysdig可以用于以后处理它
sudo sysdig -w trace.scap
查看单个容器的顶层网络连接
sudo sysdig -pc -c topconns container.name=wordpress1
将系统活动转储到文件，以便sysdig可以用于以后处理它
sudo sysdig -c topfiles_time proc.name=httpd
显示给定容器中执行的命令
sudo sysdig -pc -c spy_users container.name=wordpress1
显示每次打开的文件
sudo sysdig -w trace.scap
Introducing Tracers: Application and system tracing with Sysdig

Sysdig tracers let you track and measure spans of execution in a
distributed software system. You can instrument almost anything with a Sysdig
tracer - a method in your software, a service call, a network request, a shell
command execution, a script, and any other thing that can happen in a
computer system.

They're efficient, language independent, container friendly,
and (of course) open source.

Sysdig was born from our own team's constant frustration. System level troubleshooting is just way more of a pain than it should be — especially in container-based environments. So we took the lessons we learned while helping build network monitoring tools like WinPCap and Wireshark and created a new kind of system troubleshooting tool for Linux.

Crazy Powerful

Sysdig gives you instant access to a treasure trove of data buried within your system. Rich filtering, scripting, and an interactive UI take you from the big picture to finest detail in just a few clicks.
